thread.title: Preeti Shiekh
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Preeti Shiekh

author: Preeti Shiekh
title: Preeti Shiekh
text:
Hello friends.. This is with regards to my experience with banggood. It was my 1st experience with them.. so I had 3 list order... but 1 order got cancelled due to delivery location...
N so far I heard from my friends was like online shopping if order cancelled.. u hav to really chase th vendor...to get your refund back
But this doesn't apply with banggood. .. trust me guys. They were following my refund.. n were always updating me to not to worry... It was the best d best d best. Rather will say excellent customer service I ever faced...
I am glad that banggood hav really good employee... n they really work hard
I wish you the best future to banggood and it's team.
I shall be now always order from banggood. . Once I get my stuff deliveries I will definately write review...
So go on friends... purchase with banggood.. its good price with great customer service...
Thanku banggood
